I want Red Faction on Frostbyte 2 but that’s not going to happen.

item.description:
[b]IN THE DISTANT PAST OF 2004, A THREAD “Half life 1 remake?” IS POSTED IN A HALF LIFE FANSITE

Popular response:[/b]

Jeannotvb:

Bad idea, there’s plenty of mods out there to increase the graphics of HL1. Re-making such an incredibly large game will take years not to mention you need a large team comprised of skilled and motivated modders. You’d be much better off just making higher resolution textures and more detailed models (which has been done already).

hehehehe

Maybe a ballsy mod team will begin remaking HL2 in something like 5 years. Now is too soon.

item.title: Black Mesa-ish Remake for Half Life 2
item.dc:creator: Grape_Flavor
item.description:
I think HL2 could use an update, but not a ground-up one like Black Mesa. An in-engine upgrade would be fine. Think Cinematic Mod with a modicum of taste. Better textures, higher poly models, more “clutter”/details etc. Just not shitty like CM.

Or when Episode 3/HL3 comes out, a HL: Source type port in addition to the above. But there’s no need remaking the game from scratch.
